parameters.name: UorV
parameters.description: True to specify V, false to specify U

parameters.name: UvValue
parameters.description: U or V vertex or point that specifies the intersection of two curves

title: ISurface.IMakeIsoCurve
description: Creates a curve that represents the ISO line of a given surface.
signature:
Curve IMakeIsoCurve( 
   System.Boolean
UorV
,
   System.Double
UvValue
)

parameters.description: True to specify V, false to specify U
